column4: i'm trying to get online via wireless, i can "iwlist scan", but i can't seem to get a connection after entering "iwconfig wlan0 essid blah" - any hints?
got a GUI?
if so, use NetworkManager
i have kubuntu
can i still use network manager?
Yep
it should come by default, if not, just install it
i can't install it because i have no internet :)
to do it from the command line, you need to make sure the interface is up "ifconfig <interface> up" then get an ip address "dhclient <interface>"
that's the thing, i can't get an ip address via dhclient
are you sure you've got the right interface?
i think so.  i just see lo, eth0, wmaster0, and wlan0
i've been working with wlan0
that's the only one with wireless interface
plug in a cable?
hah
so i guess no more ideas
check you're in the right mode (managed) and that you have the right essid, encryption mode, encryption key, channel etc.
i'm in the right mode, there's no encryption
not sure how to check about the channel and stuff
dunno, it should just work out of the box, connect a cable and install network manager :)
